title: Forum Votes
body: Why do you have to be level 30 now to use that?  Why not just get rid of it already if that's the case?

replies.body: It feels kind of weird at first, until you happen across a post somewhere that's been flooded with votes from one person's several smurfs. With having certain aspects locked to level 30, it helps prevent people from commenting/voting under multiple different accounts.
Hmm I guess that makes sense.
